      • createStudentAccounts

        public static boolean createStudentAccounts(int courseID,
                                            java.util.Vector<Student> students)
        Create students account in a batch
        Parameters:
        courseID - : Identifier of selected course
        list - : List of students declared in a string "Last name"; "First Name" ; "Email" ..... Use either another semi-colon or "\n" to set data for a new student
        Returns:
        true if at least one student account is created, otherwise false.
        Procedure sends automatically an email to registered students.
